name: Devil Defense
description:
If there are any errors in the Game while Playing You can Download it for windows, Linux, or MacOS!

Devil Defense is a Game made for Mini Jam: 110                                             

Devil Defense is a turn-based strategy game that will progressively get harder and harder. While in game you can Sacrifice up to 4 of your team members (5 total people w/ player) to get more damage and more health that is randomized every time.

Music from Uppbeat:

https://uppbeat.io/t/danijel-zambo/centuries-ago

License code: MFQ7VT3UXD51WLZA
